title: ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set,includes 1 Pack 8 OZ Mini Stubby Claw Hammer and 1 Pack 16 OZ Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer,Soft Nonslip Handle & Heat Treated Head,Heavier for Higher Hardness
descriptions:
Introducing the ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set, the ultimate solution for all your hammering and clawing needs. This set includes two high-quality hammers: an 8 OZ Mini Stubby Claw Hammer and a 16 OZ Fiberglass General Purpose Claw Hammer.

**High Carbon Steel Heads**

Each hammer in this set boasts a high carbon steel head that has been heat-treated for maximum durability and strength. The heads are polished to a smooth finish and coated with a rust-preventative clear coating to ensure longevity and resistance to corrosion.

**Ergonomic Handles**

The handles of these hammers are made of rubber with a TPR coating, providing a comfortable, ergonomic grip. The non-slip texture ensures you maintain control even in challenging conditions. The fiberglass construction and vibration absorption technology reduce fatigue and strain, making these hammers easy to use for extended periods.

**Maximum Performance**

These hammers are designed for maximum performance, excelling at both driving and pulling nails. The narrow, flat striking surface of the head delivers maximum force concentration, while the sharpened, curved claw provides maximum nail-pulling leverage.

**Well-Balanced Design**

The ZUZUAN 2 Piece Hammer Set is designed with balance in mind. The weight is evenly distributed for easy handling and convenient operation. The hammers also feature a robust design for added durability and a hang hole for easy storage when not in use.

This set is perfect for anyone seeking high-quality, reliable hammers for a variety of applications. With their robust design, easy handling, and maximum performance, these hammers are sure to meet all your hammering and clawing needs.
